EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_10AM Con-Driven Contracts Microservice Arch_Q416.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: You're confirmed!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Thank you for registering for our upcoming webinar Consumer-Driven Contracts and Your Microservice Architecture.
Please see event details below:
Date: Tuesday, October 25, 2016 {{my.Save the Date:default=Save the Date}} Time: 10:00AM PDT
Join the Session <[[http://event.on24.com/wcc/r/1284626/59E23F575E8FCD81F0ACA29ACA722799]]>
Audio Information: This webinar will be streaming live via your computer speakers. {{my.My Token:default=Save the Date}}
We look forward to you joining us!
